wikipedia_page.main: Peter Thomas Hay (31 August 1932 – 7 June 2018) was an authority on British steam railways and author of numerous books and articles on the subject.  His Steaming Through series of books is based on the archive of railway photographs taken by him in the 1950s and 60s.

response: Hay was born in Brighton, Sussex, to John Edward Hay (Mayor of Brighton 1953) and May Hollingdale.  He was a brother to author Peter Thomas Hay.
